title: Oscars = Thirsty Uncle, Madison Cawthorn = Confederate Terminator 2.23.22
itunes:title: Oscars = Thirsty Uncle, Madison Cawthorn = Confederate Terminator 2.23.22
description:
In episode 1090, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and host of Snack Time Lindsay Adams to discuss Trump’s Twitter clone a shit show, Speaking of losing…Madison Cawthorn very worried about subverting voters now, The Oscars’ “Fan Favorite” Category is Already A Dumpster Fire and more!

  1. Trump’s Twitter Clone A Shit Show
  2. Speaking of Losing…Madison Cawthorn Very Worried About Subverting Voters Now
  3. The Oscars’ “Fan Favorite” Category is Already A Dumpster Fire
  4. Oscars: Twitter’s Top Fan-Voted Film Will Be Recognized During Broadcast


LISTEN: Body Movin (Feat. J. Rocc & Karriem Riggins) by J. Dilla

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
